thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Jenny Elliott
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel reviewed by Jenny Elliott

author: Jenny Elliott
title: Jenny Elliott
text: I went on the Balkan Adventure Tour. It was fantastic. Our tour guide Vlad was excellent and very knowledgeable. The local tour guides at 2 of the places we visited were very good also. We saw and did lots of things and all of our accommodation was very acceptable. Would happily recommend this tour.
